org.deeplearning4j.text.invertedindex

Class LuceneInvertedIndex<T extends SequenceElement>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deeplearning4j.text.invertedindex.LuceneInvertedIndex<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.util.Iterator<java.util.List<T>>, org.apache.lucene.index.IndexReader.ReaderClosedListener, InvertedIndex<T>

    public class LuceneInvertedIndex<T extends SequenceElement>
extends java.lang.Object
implements InvertedIndex<T>, org.apache.lucene.index.IndexReader.ReaderClosedListener, java.util.Iterator<java.util.List<T>>
    Lucene based inverted index
